thread.title: First Cuban carnival of salsa to be held in 2016Travelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: First Cuban carnival of salsa to be held in 2016Travelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: First Cuban carnival of salsa to be held in 2016Travelandtourworld.com
text:
First Cuban carnival of salsa to be held in 2016
Foreign artists are expected to attend the first Cuban carnival of salsa which will be held on Feb. 25-28 next year, announced the Cuban music website Suena Cubano.
The objective of the Cuban carnival of salsa is ‘to promote and launch to the world the Salsa, Timba, Son, you name it, that is produced currently in Cuba, as well as dancing and other artistic expressions.’
The event to be held in Havana will be presided over by arranger and precusionist Maykel Blanco, who is planning to count on many of the most prestigious Cuban groups and foreign artists.
Blanco, who conducts Salsa Mayor, a well known Cuban salsa group, added that top quality production is also expected from the event to be enjoyed by Cubans and foreigners.
The program of this first Cuban salsa carnival will be made public soon.
As part of proposals of this carnival, those interested in getting salsa dancing lessons may choose dancers from the different specialized dance saloons to be their instructors, Blanco announced.
